item.description:
From STARS (Stratford Animal Rescue Society in Startford, CT) "Paradise Green (Huntington Rd & Main St) Stratford, CT 06614 ~~~~ Raindate October 7th! ~~~~ Fun for ALL: 90+Vendors/Crafters, Pet Adoptions, Microchip Clinic, Food, Contests, Celebrities, Canine Demos, Music, Games, Free Ice Cream, Silent Auction and more..... ~~~~ Join us for a one-mile Dog Walk. It's quite a sight to see hundreds of dogs walking down Main Street! ~~~~ Pre-Registration just $10.00 this year! ~~~~
We are pleased to announce that Pam Landry will once again be joining our Festival as “Mistress of Ceremonies.” Pam is an editor for Patch.com, contributor to Milford Living Magazine, The New Haven Register, ShorelineOutandAbout.com, TheLoopNY.com and is an on air radio personality with WXPK-FM “The Peak” and WQUN-AM. ~~~~ Please join Lauren Collier as she leads the one-mile Dog Walk on Main Street. Lauren is a meteorologist and host of "Furry Friends Forecast" and “Pet Talk”with News Channel 12 Connecticut. ~~~~ S.T.A.R.S. is pleased to announce the addition of a Riot Kings concert from 4pm-6pm. With the combination of Bill "Bones" Barklay's driving guitar riffs, Keith Sinnott's solid bass lines, Kent Johannesen's soulful vocals and with Marc Mascagna’s combination of skill and heart behind the drum kit we are looking forward to a rocking good time at the festival! ~~~~ Local Pets will be available for adoption!
item.name: 7th Annual Fall Festival to Benefit Animals in Stratford, CT!
